short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create an Inbox of your Chrome Tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UpInbox is the simplest way to keep track of web pages you want to visit later. It's like an inbox for your web pages.

Add. Prioritize. Read. Remove.

New in version 0.0.1.0!

Shortcuts now available
- Add Page: Alt + Shift + U (Windows) / Option + Shift + U (Mac)
- Open UpInbox: Alt + Shift + I (Windows) / Option + Shift + I (Mac)

Bug Fixes:
* Fix issue where UpInbox would not open on new Chrome tab.
